Articles.Content:
I'm currently play KSP on a lower end PC. The cpu is only 1.3ghz so i need plenty of free space for this game to work well.

I noticed that when i'm faced away from the animated people, all the scientists, engineers, and vehicles I get more frames than I

do looking at them. I'm pretty sure this is due to the animations they portray, and i was wondering if there is a way you can remove

the little fellas? Maybe a mod somewhere that does that, or just even a simple config file edit i can do to remove them. Even limit the

amount of them.
You don't need a mod, go into the settings on the startup screen and toggle it there.
I don't see anything in the options. Any specific things i need to look for?
